TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, your computer runs better, that is out the door.

I wish Kerbal Space Program will release 1.0 this week...

granted its a cheap copy of sonic 06 (please stop asking for this)

i wish i was batman(im not saying im not batman but me and him have never been seen in a room together)

Granted. Batman and Robin Re-amped!

I wish Dracula X wasn't so frekin' expensive. I need a copy!

Granted. It is now EXTREMELY expensive.

I wish there was no world hunger.

Grande. Nobody in the world is hungry. Instead, now everyone is always so full that they feel like they're gonna throw up but never do, so they are in eternal torment.

I wish today wasn't Monday.

Granted, today is Tuesday. Every other day is now Monday.

I wish I wasn't broke.

Granted, you have 109 million dollars on your bank account. You live in a socialist utopia.

I wish for a Real Solar System spaceplane...

Wouldn't that mean everyone has 109 million dollars in this utopia?

Granted it has 9 ÃŽâ€V

i wish wish for the yellow iron crown

You get a crown made of a gold-iron alloy (I'm not a metallurgist), it falls apart quickly due to poor construction.

I wish that people would stop stop making wishes which are references to things I have no knowledge of.

Granted. Now they are only references to the embarrassing moments in your life.

I wish that I could be one of the Astronauts who goes to Mars for NASA.

Granted, due to an error in converting from the metric to imperial measurements, you only have enough oxygen to last 5 days on Mars.

I wish that affordable immortality would be invented already.

Granted only affordible for trilionars

i wish for a gif

Granted, however, the gif is frozen in time, and is now to be called... a Picture.

I wish for KSP .13.3 to be released.

Granted, it is released by EA

I wish for plutonium, and a hazmat suit so I don't get radiation poisoning

Granted, but you ate it accidentally )

I wish for a light, portable, stable, indestructable, infinite energy source with a 250 V/50 Hz European electric socket.

Granted. Infinite energy = arguably an infinitely huge black hole that consumes the universe. But at least you have your lightbulb.

I wish for Richter to be a character in Smash Bros. That'd be the greatest thing in my life.

Granted but he just a Ike clone

i wish for America

Granted, it brings freedom to your country.

I wish for a better programming skills.

Granted, however, you can only write in a language lost to programming long ago.

I wish for ACT testing to be on a Monday instead of a Tuesday. (I would then have a 5 day weekend.)

Also

Granted, it brings freedom to your country.

How is that a bad thing?

Granted. But your parents make you study for all 5 days, and then you get a 10 overall.

I want to understand people.

Do you mean like, understand people, or understand... people? There's a difference here...

Granted. You know every one thing about people, including things you may not have wanted to know.

I wish Mariyate would help me transpose songs onto Crescendo. She's so stubborn lately...

A female claiming to be Mari Yate shows up at your door, and writes crescendos under all your sheet-music. She then refuses to leave. Mari eats your food and water, and uses your electricity and internet.

I wish for the next Falcon-9 self landing to go perfectly and not fall over on the barge.

Granted, but the barge is captured by Somali pirates and the Falcon-9 is sold on the black market.

I wish for Sonic '16 to be conceived and released.

Granted (sigh) it's worse then sonic 06

i wish to live on the iss

Granted. You now must exercise daily, eat tortillas instead of sandwich bread, float everywhere rather than just walking [harder than it sounds], commit to work far more than you ever have, an leave your friends. I'd join if I could, but I'm pretty sure they don't have internet. I'm not sure about that one, though. At least, not as we do.

I wish for a reeeeeeeaaaaaalllllyyyyyy long internet cable so I can join him.
